Class CardObjectivePlot

java.lang.Object
fr.cotedazur.univ.polytech.card.CardObjectivePlot
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardObjective
public class CardObjectivePlot extends Object implements CardObjective
CardObjectivePlot is a class that represents a card objective plot.
